name: I.T Follows
description:
You woke up with no memory of what happened and where you are. Now you got to find a way out, but you are not alone... I.T FOLLOWS is a Short First-Person Horror Game. You only got 1 life, if you die you have to restart the game. Think you can escape?

WASD ---> Movement

Shift ----> Run

Tab ----> Inventory

Right/Left Mouse Click ------> Pick up/Interact

Ctrl ----> Crouch
